Name: ALPHA BOX
About the game: Game content: ALPHA BOX is a 3D action platformer that's easy to learn, exciting to play, and deep enough to challenge the greatest gamers. You'll be rewarded by manipulating a block to run through the game, this fast-paced game is heartbreaking yet engaging and addictive. Enjoy extreme speed, sprint forward and master the movement. In ALPHA BOX, response and timing are key. Get ready for impossible challenges and push your skills to the limit. The pacing of the obstacle avoidance game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. . operate: Right W or D Left Avoid kaleidoscopic obstacles and pick up energy balls along the way The difficulty of the game increases as the game progresses feature: * Difficulty progression. * Two game modes. * Competitive, challenging and stimulating * There is no limit to the level of the level. Try as many times as necessary. * Simple controls.
